Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Nordica
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temp. rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Oak Park, Addison, Harlem and Belmont due to fire department activity near Belmont/Nordica.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Oak Park, Addison, Harlem and Belmont due to fire department activity near Belmont/Nordica.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange and Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange and Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Roosevelt. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange and Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level at Roosevelt.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
